name: range
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool chess_puzzles_v2.
Tool description: Quickly access 1.000.000+ chess puzzles!
API description: Fetches random chess puzzles within a specified rating range.

number_of_puzzles.description: The number of puzzles to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

max_deviation.description: The maximum possible rating deviation. Defaults to 100.

min.description: The minimum rating a puzzle can have. Defaults to 1200.

max.description: The maximum rating a puzzle can have. Defaults to 1600.
